00047   Err::Param &Err::getParam() {
00048     static Param m_Param;
00049     return m_Param;
00050   }
00051 
00057   void Err::errAbort(const std::string &msg, const std::string prefix){ // throw (Except) {
00058     unsigned int size = getParam().m_ErrHandlers.size();
00059     assert(size > 0);
00060     std::string errMsg = prefix + msg;;
00061     // GUI's do not like the newline
00062     if(getParam().m_NewLineOnError) {
00063         errMsg = "\n" + errMsg;
00064     }
00065     getParam().m_ErrHandlers[size - 1]->handleError(errMsg);
00066   }
00067 
00072   void Err::pushHandler(ErrHandler *handler) {
00073     getParam().m_ErrHandlers.push_back(handler);
00074   }
00075 
00080   ErrHandler *Err::popHandler() {
00081     unsigned int count = getParam().m_ErrHandlers.size();
00082     if(count < 1) {
00083       Err::errAbort("Err::popHandler() - can't pop error handler when there aren't any left.");
00084     }
00085     ErrHandler *handler = getParam().m_ErrHandlers[count - 1];
00086     getParam().m_ErrHandlers.pop_back();
00087     return handler;
00088   }
00089 
00095   void Err::setThrowStatus(bool doThrow) {
00096     VerboseErrHandler *handler = new VerboseErrHandler(doThrow);
00097     pushHandler(handler);
00098   }
00099 
00106   void Err::configureErrHandler(bool doThrow, bool verbose) {
00107     VerboseErrHandler *handler = new VerboseErrHandler(doThrow, verbose);
00108     pushHandler(handler);
00109   }
00110 
00116   void Err::setNewLineOnError(bool newline) {
00117     getParam().m_NewLineOnError = newline;
00118   }

00120 void Err::apt_err_assert(const std::string& file,int line,
00121                          const std::string& condstr,
00122                          bool cond,
00123                          const std::string& msg)
00124 {
00125   if (!cond) {
00126     std::string errmsg=file+":"+ToStr(line)+": '"+condstr+"'==false";
00127     if (msg!="") {
00128       errmsg+=" "+msg;
00129     }
00130     errAbort(errmsg);
00131   }
00132 }
00133 
00134 void Err::apt_err_abort(const std::string& file,int line,
00135                         const std::string& msg)
00136 {
00137   std::string errmsg=file+":"+ToStr(line)+": "+msg;
00138   errAbort(errmsg);
00139 }
